summary: Base class that encapsulates the common functionality for Idefics pre‑trained models, managing configuration, weight initialization and device placement so that derived vision‑language models can be loaded, saved and used for inference or fine‑tuning.
business_intent: Enable developers to quickly integrate and adapt Idefics transformer models for multimodal AI applications such as image‑text understanding, content generation, and retrieval, reducing the effort required to handle model loading and setup.
